Reviews.Title: “Friendly and helpful staff, great location, great breakfast, good value”
Reviews.Author: joy_s7
Reviews.Content: hotel budget lowrise hotel lift walking distance sultanahmet region offer highlight efficient helpful manager sense humour departure homecoming pleasant experience constant source sightseeing advice breakfast overlooking bosphorous blue mosque pleasant experience hotel clean including wireless internet hotel organised downside restaurants nearby surprisingly location aimed tourists hesitation recommending hotel value pays book ahead cheaper rates recommended friends intending visit istanbul

Reviews.Title: “Perfect budget hotel in great location”
Reviews.Author: JuRo
Reviews.Content: hotel excellent situation quieter main barrestaurant strip sultanhamet booked 4 nights 60 euros night included free transfer airport unfortunately allocated awful tiny ground floor window spent night day moved floor front window street floors suites expensive breakfast served terrace hot view sea staff incredibly helpful friendly free internet computers lobby free tea coffee
